pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Add support for moving and rotating models

content.raw:
There are a couple of compile warnings:

~~~
/home/developer/ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/transform_control/TransformControl.cc:84:8: warning: lambda capture 'this' is not used [-Wunused-lambda-capture]
      [this](const ignition::msgs::Boolean &/*_rep*/, const bool _result)
       ^
/home/developer/ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.cc:219:12: warning: lambda capture 'this' is not used [-Wunused-lambda-capture]
          [this](const ignition::msgs::Boolean &/*_rep*/, const bool _result)
           ^
~~~
